# awx_schedule (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)
- `rrule` (String)
- `unified_job_template_id` (Number)

### Optional

- `description` (String)
- `enabled` (Boolean)
- `extra_data` (String) Extra data to be pass for the schedule (YAML format)

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
